full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSAD MA'I LAM BSGRIGS CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,'DI NI CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I TSAD MA'I LAM RIM YOD DO ZHES ZER BA DE NYID 'KHRUL MED YIN MOD KYI, RJE NYID KYIS MDZAD PA'I MDZAD BYANG MI SNANG NA'ANG, ^RJE'I GSUNG YIN PAR GOR MA CHAG GO ,ZHES SKYABS MGON MTSUNGS MED DAM PA YONGS 'DZIN KHRI RIN PO CHE RNAMS BSUM KYIS GSUM PAS YID TSES PA'I GNAS SU BYA RIGS SO,, ,,SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,
